meanings.definition: A person who supports or promotes something.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a strong favorers of recycling and always encourages others to do the same.
meanings.sent2: The favorers of the new policy were excited to see positive changes in the community.
meanings.sent3: The favorers of the bake sale were so enthusiastic that they baked hundreds of cookies!
meanings.sent4: She was like a shining beacon of support, a true favorers of the arts.
meanings.sent5: The favorers of the charity event worked tirelessly to ensure its success.

meanings.definition: Those who show kindness or goodwill towards others.
meanings.sent1: The favorers in our neighborhood always greet each other with warm smiles.
meanings.sent2: She was known as one of the biggest favorers in the office, always ready to lend a helping hand.
meanings.sent3: The favorers at the animal shelter spent hours playing with the puppies and kittens.
meanings.sent4: Their kindness was like a gentle breeze, the favorers spreading positivity wherever they went.
meanings.sent5: The favorers in the community organized a fundraiser to help a family in need.
